ayah: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنزَلَ عَلَىٰ عَبۡدِهِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ وَلَمۡ يَجۡعَل لَّهُۥ عِوَجَاۜ
ayah_translit: al-hamdu lillahi alladhi anzala ala abdihi al-kitaba walam yaj'al lahu iwaja
ayah_english: All Praise (is) for Allah the One Who (has) revealed to His slave the Book and not (has) made in it any crookedness

ayah: قَيِّمٗا لِّيُنذِرَ بَأۡسٗا شَدِيدٗا مِّن لَّدُنۡهُ وَيُبَشِّرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ أَنَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرًا حَسَنٗا
ayah_translit: qayyiman liyundhira basan shadidan min ladun'hu wayubashira al-mu'minina alladhina ya'maluna al-salihati anna lahum ajran hasanan
ayah_english: Straight to warn (of) a punishment severe from near Him and give glad tidings (to) the believers those who do righteous deeds that for them (is) a good reward (is) a good reward

ayah: مَّـٰكِثِينَ فِيهِ أَبَدٗا
ayah_translit: makithina fihi abadan
ayah_english: (They will) abide in it forever

ayah: وَيُنذِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ قَالُواْ ٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ وَلَدٗا
ayah_translit: wayundhira alladhina qalu ittakhadha al-lahu waladan
ayah_english: And to warn those who say Allah has taken Allah has taken a son

ayah: مَّا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا لِأٓبَآئِهِمۡۚ كَبُرَتۡ كَلِمَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡۚ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبٗا
ayah_translit: ma lahum bihi min il'min wala liabaihim kaburat kalimatan takhruju min afwahihim in yaquluna illa kadhiban
ayah_english: Not they have about it any knowledge and not their forefathers Mighty (is) the word (that) comes out of their mouths Not they say except a lie

ayah: مَّا لَهُم بِهِۦ مِنۡ عِلۡمٖ وَلَا لِأٓبَآئِهِمۡۚ كَبُرَتۡ كَلِمَةٗ تَخۡرُجُ مِنۡ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡۚ إِن يَقُولُونَ إِلَّا كَذِبٗا

ayah: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
ayah_translit: fala'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka ala atharihim in lam yu'minu bihadha al-hadithi asafan
ayah_english: Then perhaps you would (be) the one who kills yourself over their footsteps if not they believe in this [the] narration (in) grief

ayah: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا مَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ زِينَةٗ لَّهَا لِنَبۡلُوَهُمۡ أَيُّهُمۡ أَحۡسَنُ عَمَلٗا
ayah_translit: inna ja'alna ma ala al-ardi zinatan laha linabluwahum ayyuhum ahsanu amalan
ayah_english: Indeed We We have made what (is) on the earth adornment for it that We may test [them] which of them (is) best (in) deed

ayah: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا
ayah_translit: wa-inna laja'iluna ma alayha sa'idan juruzan
ayah_english: And indeed We (will) surely make what (is) on it soil barren

ayah: وَإِنَّا لَجَٰعِلُونَ مَا عَلَيۡهَا صَعِيدٗا جُرُزًا
ayah_translit: wa-inna laja'iluna ma alayha sa'idan juruzan

ayah: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
ayah_translit: am hasib'ta anna ashaba al-kahfi wal-raqimi kanu min ayatina ajaban
ayah_english: Or you think that (the) companions (of) the cave and the inscription were among Our Signs a wonder

ayah: إِذۡ أَوَى ٱلۡفِتۡيَةُ إِلَى ٱلۡكَهۡفِ فَقَالُواْ رَبَّنَآ ءَاتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحۡمَةٗ وَهَيِّئۡ لَنَا مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا رَشَدٗا
ayah_translit: idh awa al-fit'yatu ila al-kahfi faqalu rabbana atina min ladunka rahmatan wahayyi lana min amrina rashadan
ayah_english: When retreated the youths to the cave and they said Our Lord! Grant us from Yourself Mercy and facilitate for us [from] our affair (in the) right way

ayah: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا
ayah_translit: thumma ba'athnahum lina'lama ayyu al-hiz'bayni ahsa lima labithu amadan
ayah_english: Then We raised them up that We make evident which (of) the two parties best calculated for what (they had) remained (in) time

ayah_english: Then We raised them up that We make evident which (of) the two parties best calculated for what (they had) remained (in) time

ayah: ثُمَّ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِنَعۡلَمَ أَيُّ ٱلۡحِزۡبَيۡنِ أَحۡصَىٰ لِمَا لَبِثُوٓاْ أَمَدٗا
ayah_translit: thumma ba'athnahum lina'lama ayyu al-hiz'bayni ahsa lima labithu amadan
ayah_english: Then We raised them up that We make evident which (of) the two parties best calculated for what (they had) remained (in) time

ayah: نَّحۡنُ نَقُصُّ عَلَيۡكَ نَبَأَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ إِنَّهُمۡ فِتۡيَةٌ ءَامَنُواْ بِرَبِّهِمۡ وَزِدۡنَٰهُمۡ هُدٗى
ayah_translit: nahnu naqussu alayka naba-ahum bil-haqi innahum fit'yatun amanu birabbihim wazid'nahum hudan
ayah_english: We narrate to you their story in truth Indeed they (were) youths who believed in their Lord and We increased them (in) guidance

ayah: وَرَبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِذۡ قَامُواْ فَقَالُواْ رَبُّنَا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَن نَّدۡعُوَاْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَٰهٗاۖ لَّقَدۡ قُلۡنَآ إِذٗا شَطَطًا
ayah_translit: warabatna ala qulubihim idh qamu faqalu rabbuna rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dunihi ilahan laqad qul'na idhan shatatan
ayah_english: And We made firm [on] their hearts when they stood up and said Our Lord (is) the Lord (of) the heavens and the earth Never we will invoke besides Him besides Him any god Certainly we would have said then an enormity

ayah_english: And We made firm [on] their hearts when they stood up and said Our Lord (is) the Lord (of) the heavens and the earth Never we will invoke besides Him besides Him any god Certainly we would have said then an enormity

ayah: وَرَبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِذۡ قَامُواْ فَقَالُواْ رَبُّنَا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَن نَّدۡعُوَاْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَٰهٗاۖ لَّقَدۡ قُلۡنَآ إِذٗا شَطَطًا
ayah_translit: warabatna ala qulubihim idh qamu faqalu rabbuna rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dunihi ilahan laqad qul'na idhan shatatan
ayah_english: And We made firm [on] their hearts when they stood up and said Our Lord (is) the Lord (of) the heavens and the earth Never we will invoke besides Him besides Him any god Certainly we would have said then an enormity

ayah: وَرَبَطۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ إِذۡ قَامُواْ فَقَالُواْ رَبُّنَا رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَن نَّدۡعُوَاْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ إِلَٰهٗاۖ لَّقَدۡ قُلۡنَآ إِذٗا شَطَطًا
ayah_translit: warabatna ala qulubihim idh qamu faqalu rabbuna rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi lan nad'uwa min dunihi ilahan laqad qul'na idhan shatatan
ayah_english: And We made firm [on] their hearts when they stood up and said Our Lord (is) the Lord (of) the heavens and the earth Never we will invoke besides Him besides Him any god Certainly we would have said then an enormity

ayah: هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ قَوۡمُنَا ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةٗۖ لَّوۡلَا يَأۡتُونَ عَلَيۡهِم بِسُلۡطَٰنِۭ بَيِّنٖۖ فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا
ayah_translit: haulai qawmuna ittakhadhu min dunihi alihatan lawla yatuna alayhim bisul'tanin bayyinin faman azlamu mimmani if'tara ala al-lahi kadhiban
ayah_english: These our people have taken besides Him besides Him gods Why not they come to them with an authority clear And who (is) more wrong than (one) who invents against Allah a lie

ayah: وَإِذِ ٱعۡتَزَلۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ فَأۡوُۥٓاْ إِلَى ٱلۡكَهۡفِ يَنشُرۡ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَيُهَيِّئۡ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَمۡرِكُم مِّرۡفَقٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idhi i'tazaltumuhum wama ya'buduna illa al-laha fawu ila al-kahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mir'faqan
ayah_english: And when you withdraw from them and what they worship except Allah then retreat to the cave Will spread for you your Lord of His Mercy and will facilitate for you [from] your affair (in) ease

ayah: وَإِذِ ٱعۡتَزَلۡتُمُوهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ فَأۡوُۥٓاْ إِلَى ٱلۡكَهۡفِ يَنشُرۡ لَكُمۡ رَبُّكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَيُهَيِّئۡ لَكُم مِّنۡ أَمۡرِكُم مِّرۡفَقٗا

ayah_translit: wa-idhi i'tazaltumuhum wama ya'buduna illa al-laha fawu ila al-kahfi yanshur lakum rabbukum min rahmatihi wayuhayyi lakum min amrikum mir'faqan
ayah_english: And when you withdraw from them and what they worship except Allah then retreat to the cave Will spread for you your Lord of His Mercy and will facilitate for you [from] your affair (in) ease

ayah: ۞وَتَرَى ٱلشَّمۡسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّزَٰوَرُ عَن كَهۡفِهِمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّقۡرِضُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِ وَهُمۡ فِي فَجۡوَةٖ مِّنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۗ مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ وَلِيّٗا مُّرۡشِدٗا
ayah_translit: watara al-shamsa idha tala'at tazawaru an kahfihim dhata al-yamini wa-idha gharabat taqriduhum dhata al-shimali wahum fi fajwatin min'hu dhalika min ayati al-lahi man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahu waliyyan mur'shidan
ayah_english: And you (might) have seen the sun when it rose inclining away from their cave to the right and when it set passing away from them to the left while they (lay) in the open space thereof That (was) from (the) Signs (of) Allah Whoever Allah guides Allah guides and he (is) the guided one and whoever He lets go astray then never you will find for him a protector a guide

ayah: ۞وَتَرَى ٱلشَّمۡسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّزَٰوَرُ عَن كَهۡفِهِمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّقۡرِضُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِ وَهُمۡ فِي فَجۡوَةٖ مِّنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۗ مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ وَلِيّٗا مُّرۡشِدٗا

ayah: ۞وَتَرَى ٱلشَّمۡسَ إِذَا طَلَعَت تَّزَٰوَرُ عَن كَهۡفِهِمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَإِذَا غَرَبَت تَّقۡرِضُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِ وَهُمۡ فِي فَجۡوَةٖ مِّنۡهُۚ ذَٰلِكَ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِۗ مَن يَهۡدِ ٱللَّهُ فَهُوَ ٱلۡمُهۡتَدِۖ وَمَن يُضۡلِلۡ فَلَن تَجِدَ لَهُۥ وَلِيّٗا مُّرۡشِدٗا

ayah_translit: watara al-shamsa idha tala'at tazawaru an kahfihim dhata al-yamini wa-idha gharabat taqriduhum dhata al-shimali wahum fi fajwatin min'hu dhalika min ayati al-lahi man yahdi al-lahu fahuwa al-muh'tadi waman yud'lil falan tajida lahu waliyyan mur'shidan

ayah_english: And you (might) have seen the sun when it rose inclining away from their cave to the right and when it set passing away from them to the left while they (lay) in the open space thereof That (was) from (the) Signs (of) Allah Whoever Allah guides Allah guides and he (is) the guided one and whoever He lets go astray then never you will find for him a protector a guide

ayah: وَتَحۡسَبُهُمۡ أَيۡقَاظٗا وَهُمۡ رُقُودٞۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِۖ وَكَلۡبُهُم بَٰسِطٞ ذِرَاعَيۡهِ بِٱلۡوَصِيدِۚ لَوِ ٱطَّلَعۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوَلَّيۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِرَارٗا وَلَمُلِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ رُعۡبٗا
ayah_translit: watahsabuhum ayqazan wahum ruqudun wanuqallibuhum dhata al-yamini wadhata al-shimali wakalbuhum basitun dhira'ayhi bil-wasidi lawi ittala'ta alayhim lawallayta min'hum firaran walamuli'ta min'hum ru'ban
ayah_english: And you (would) think them awake while they (were) asleep And We turned them to the right and to the left while their dog stretched his two forelegs at the entrance If you had looked at them you (would) have surely turned back from them (in) flight and surely you would have been filled by them (with) terror

ayah_english: And you (would) think them awake while they (were) asleep And We turned them to the right and to the left while their dog stretched his two forelegs at the entrance If you had looked at them you (would) have surely turned back from them (in) flight and surely you would have been filled by them (with) terror

ayah: وَتَحۡسَبُهُمۡ أَيۡقَاظٗا وَهُمۡ رُقُودٞۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِۖ وَكَلۡبُهُم بَٰسِطٞ ذِرَاعَيۡهِ بِٱلۡوَصِيدِۚ لَوِ ٱطَّلَعۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوَلَّيۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِرَارٗا وَلَمُلِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ رُعۡبٗا

ayah: وَتَحۡسَبُهُمۡ أَيۡقَاظٗا وَهُمۡ رُقُودٞۚ وَنُقَلِّبُهُمۡ ذَاتَ ٱلۡيَمِينِ وَذَاتَ ٱلشِّمَالِۖ وَكَلۡبُهُم بَٰسِطٞ ذِرَاعَيۡهِ بِٱلۡوَصِيدِۚ لَوِ ٱطَّلَعۡتَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَوَلَّيۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ فِرَارٗا وَلَمُلِئۡتَ مِنۡهُمۡ رُعۡبٗا
ayah_translit: watahsabuhum ayqazan wahum ruqudun wanuqallibuhum dhata al-yamini wadhata al-shimali wakalbuhum basitun dhira'ayhi bil-wasidi lawi ittala'ta alayhim lawallayta min'hum firaran walamuli'ta min'hum ru'ban
ayah_english: And you (would) think them awake while they (were) asleep And We turned them to the right and to the left while their dog stretched his two forelegs at the entrance If you had looked at them you (would) have surely turned back from them (in) flight and surely you would have been filled by them (with) terror

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ بَعَثۡنَٰهُمۡ لِيَتَسَآءَلُواْ بَيۡنَهُمۡۚ قَالَ قَآئِلٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡۖ قَالُواْ لَبِثۡنَا يَوۡمًا أَوۡ بَعۡضَ يَوۡمٖۚ قَالُواْ رَبُّكُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثۡتُمۡ فَٱبۡعَثُوٓاْ أَحَدَكُم بِوَرِقِكُمۡ هَٰذِهِۦٓ إِلَى ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ فَلۡيَنظُرۡ أَيُّهَآ أَزۡكَىٰ طَعَامٗا فَلۡيَأۡتِكُم بِرِزۡقٖ مِّنۡهُ وَلۡيَتَلَطَّفۡ وَلَا يُشۡعِرَنَّ بِكُمۡ أَحَدًا
ayah_translit: wakadhalika ba'athnahum liyatasaalu baynahum qala qailun min'hum kam labith'tum qalu labith'na yawman aw ba'da yawmin qalu rabbukum a'lamu bima labith'tum fa-ib'athu ahadakum biwariqikum hadhihi ila al-madinati falyanzur ayyuha azka ta'aman falyatikum biriz'qin min'hu walyatalattaf wala yush'iranna bikum ahadan
ayah_english: And similarly We raised them that they might question among them Said a speaker among them How long have you remained They said We have remained a day or a part (of) a day They said Your Lord knows best how long you have remained So send one of you (with this) silver coin of yours with this (silver coin of yours) to the city and let him see which is the purest food and let him bring to you provision from it and let him be cautious And let not be aware about you anyone

ayah: إِنَّهُمۡ إِن يَظۡهَرُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَرۡجُمُوكُمۡ أَوۡ يُعِيدُوكُمۡ فِي مِلَّتِهِمۡ وَلَن تُفۡلِحُوٓاْ إِذًا أَبَدٗا
ayah_translit: innahum in yazharu alaykum yarjumukum aw yu'idukum fi millatihim walan tuf'lihu idhan abadan
ayah_english: Indeed [they] if they come to know about you they will stone you or return you to their religion And never will you succeed then ever

ayah: إِنَّهُمۡ إِن يَظۡهَرُواْ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَرۡجُمُوكُمۡ أَوۡ يُعِيدُوكُمۡ فِي مِلَّتِهِمۡ وَلَن تُفۡلِحُوٓاْ إِذًا أَبَدٗا
ayah_translit: innahum in yazharu alaykum yarjumukum aw yu'idukum fi millatihim walan tuf'lihu idhan abadan
ayah_english: Indeed [they] if they come to know about you they will stone you or return you to their religion And never will you succeed then ever

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعۡثَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهَآ إِذۡ يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَمۡرَهُمۡۖ فَقَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ عَلَيۡهِم بُنۡيَٰنٗاۖ رَّبُّهُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِهِمۡۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ غَلَبُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِمۡ لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيۡهِم مَّسۡجِدٗا
ayah_translit: wakadhalika a'tharna alayhim liya'lamu anna wa'da al-lahi haqqun wa-anna al-sa'ata la rayba fiha idh yatanaza'una baynahum amrahum faqalu ib'nu alayhim bun'yanan rabbuhum a'lamu bihim qala alladhina ghalabu ala amrihim lanattakhidhanna alayhim masjidan
ayah_english: And similarly We made known about them that they might know that (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true and that (about) the Hour (there is) no doubt in it When they disputed among themselves about their affair and they said Construct over them a structure Their Lord knows best about them Said those who prevailed in their matter Surely we will take over them a place of worship

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعۡثَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهَآ إِذۡ يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَمۡرَهُمۡۖ فَقَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ عَلَيۡهِم بُنۡيَٰنٗاۖ رَّبُّهُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِهِمۡۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ غَلَبُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِمۡ لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيۡهِم مَّسۡجِدٗا

ayah_english: And similarly We made known about them that they might know that (the) Promise (of) Allah (is) true and that (about) the Hour (there is) no doubt in it When they disputed among themselves about their affair and they said Construct over them a structure Their Lord knows best about them Said those who prevailed in their matter Surely we will take over them a place of worship

ayah: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَعۡثَرۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ لِيَعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞ وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهَآ إِذۡ يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ أَمۡرَهُمۡۖ فَقَالُواْ ٱبۡنُواْ عَلَيۡهِم بُنۡيَٰنٗاۖ رَّبُّهُمۡ أَعۡلَمُ بِهِمۡۚ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ غَلَبُواْ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرِهِمۡ لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ عَلَيۡهِم مَّسۡجِدٗا

ayah: سَيَقُولُونَ ثَلَٰثَةٞ رَّابِعُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ خَمۡسَةٞ سَادِسُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ رَجۡمَۢا بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ وَيَقُولُونَ سَبۡعَةٞ وَثَامِنُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡۚ قُل رَّبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ بِعِدَّتِهِم مَّا يَعۡلَمُهُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٞۗ فَلَا تُمَارِ فِيهِمۡ إِلَّا مِرَآءٗ ظَٰهِرٗا وَلَا تَسۡتَفۡتِ فِيهِم مِّنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: sayaquluna thalathatun rabi'uhum kalbuhum wayaquluna khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bil-ghaybi wayaquluna sab'atun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbi a'lamu bi'iddatihim ma ya'lamuhum illa qalilun fala tumari fihim illa miraan zahiran wala tastafti fihim min'hum ahadan
ayah_english: They say (they were) three the forth of them their dog and they say (they were) five the sixth of them their dog guessing about the unseen and they say (they were) seven and the eight of them their dog Say My Lord knows best their number None knows them except a few So (do) not argue about them except (with) an argument obvious and (do) not inquire about them among them (from) anyone

ayah: سَيَقُولُونَ ثَلَٰثَةٞ رَّابِعُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ وَيَقُولُونَ خَمۡسَةٞ سَادِسُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡ رَجۡمَۢا بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ وَيَقُولُونَ سَبۡعَةٞ وَثَامِنُهُمۡ كَلۡبُهُمۡۚ قُل رَّبِّيٓ أَعۡلَمُ بِعِدَّتِهِم مَّا يَعۡلَمُهُمۡ إِلَّا قَلِيلٞۗ فَلَا تُمَارِ فِيهِمۡ إِلَّا مِرَآءٗ ظَٰهِرٗا وَلَا تَسۡتَفۡتِ فِيهِم مِّنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: sayaquluna thalathatun rabi'uhum kalbuhum wayaquluna khamsatun sadisuhum kalbuhum rajman bil-ghaybi wayaquluna sab'atun wathaminuhum kalbuhum qul rabbi a'lamu bi'iddatihim ma ya'lamuhum illa qalilun fala tumari fihim illa miraan zahiran wala tastafti fihim min'hum ahadan
ayah_english: They say (they were) three the forth of them their dog and they say (they were) five the sixth of them their dog guessing about the unseen and they say (they were) seven and the eight of them their dog Say My Lord knows best their number None knows them except a few So (do) not argue about them except (with) an argument obvious and (do) not inquire about them among them (from) anyone

ayah: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا
ayah_translit: wala taqulanna lishay'in inni fa'ilun dhalika ghadan
ayah_english: And (do) not say of anything Indeed I will do that tomorrow

ayah: إِلَّآ أَن يَشَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَٱذۡكُر رَّبَّكَ إِذَا نَسِيتَ وَقُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَهۡدِيَنِ رَبِّي لِأَقۡرَبَ مِنۡ هَٰذَا رَشَدٗا
ayah_translit: illa an yashaa al-lahu wa-udh'kur rabbaka idha nasita waqul asa an yahdiyani rabbi li-aqraba min hadha rashadan
ayah_english: Except If Allah wills Allah wills And remember your Lord when you forget and say Perhaps [that] will guide me my Lord to a nearer (way) than this right way

ayah: وَلَبِثُواْ فِي كَهۡفِهِمۡ ثَلَٰثَ مِاْئَةٖ سِنِينَ وَٱزۡدَادُواْ تِسۡعٗا
ayah_translit: walabithu fi kahfihim thalatha mi-atin sinina wa-iz'dadu tis'an
ayah_english: And they remained in their cave (for) three hundred years and add nine

ayah_english: And they remained in their cave (for) three hundred years and add nine

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُواْۖ لَهُۥ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ أَبۡصِرۡ بِهِۦ وَأَسۡمِعۡۚ مَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا يُشۡرِكُ فِي حُكۡمِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: quli al-lahu a'lamu bima labithu lahu ghaybu al-samawati wal-ardi absir bihi wa-asmi' ma lahum min dunihi min waliyyin wala yush'riku fi huk'mihi ahadan
ayah_english: Say Allah knows best about what (period) they remained For Him (is the) unseen (of) the heavens and the earth How clearly He sees [of it] And how clearly He hears Not for them besides Him besides Him any protector and not He shares [in] His Commands (with) anyone

ayah: قُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا لَبِثُواْۖ لَهُۥ غَيۡبُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ أَبۡصِرۡ بِهِۦ وَأَسۡمِعۡۚ مَا لَهُم مِّن دُونِهِۦ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا يُشۡرِكُ فِي حُكۡمِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

ayah: وَٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَۖ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَن تَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min dunihi mul'tahadan
ayah_english: And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book (of) your Lord None can change His Words and never you will find besides Him besides Him a refuge

ayah: وَٱتۡلُ مَآ أُوحِيَ إِلَيۡكَ مِن كِتَابِ رَبِّكَۖ لَا مُبَدِّلَ لِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَن تَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-ut'lu ma uhiya ilayka min kitabi rabbika la mubaddila likalimatihi walan tajida min dunihi mul'tahadan
ayah_english: And recite what has been revealed to you of the Book (of) your Lord None can change His Words and never you will find besides Him besides Him a refuge

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ نَفۡسَكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَهُۥۖ وَلَا تَعۡدُ عَيۡنَاكَ عَنۡهُمۡ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مَنۡ أَغۡفَلۡنَا قَلۡبَهُۥ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُهُۥ فُرُطٗا
ayah_translit: wa-is'bir nafsaka ma'a alladhina yad'una rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-'ashiyi yuriduna wajhahu wala ta'du aynaka anhum turidu zinata al-hayati al-dun'ya wala tuti' man aghfalna qalbahu an dhik'rina wa-ittaba'a hawahu wakana amruhu furutan
ayah_english: And be patient yourself with those who call their Lord in the morning and the evening desiring His Face And (let) not pass beyond your eyes over them desiring adornment (of) the life (of) the world and (do) not obey whom We Have Made Heedless his heart of Our rememberance and follows his desires and is his affair (in) excess

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ نَفۡسَكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَهُۥۖ وَلَا تَعۡدُ عَيۡنَاكَ عَنۡهُمۡ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مَنۡ أَغۡفَلۡنَا قَلۡبَهُۥ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُهُۥ فُرُطٗا

ayah: وَٱصۡبِرۡ نَفۡسَكَ مَعَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَدۡعُونَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَدَوٰةِ وَٱلۡعَشِيِّ يُرِيدُونَ وَجۡهَهُۥۖ وَلَا تَعۡدُ عَيۡنَاكَ عَنۡهُمۡ تُرِيدُ زِينَةَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَا تُطِعۡ مَنۡ أَغۡفَلۡنَا قَلۡبَهُۥ عَن ذِكۡرِنَا وَٱتَّبَعَ هَوَىٰهُ وَكَانَ أَمۡرُهُۥ فُرُطٗا
ayah_translit: wa-is'bir nafsaka ma'a alladhina yad'una rabbahum bil-ghadati wal-'ashiyi yuriduna wajhahu wala ta'du aynaka anhum turidu zinata al-hayati al-dun'ya wala tuti' man aghfalna qalbahu an dhik'rina wa-ittaba'a hawahu wakana amruhu furutan
ayah_english: And be patient yourself with those who call their Lord in the morning and the evening desiring His Face And (let) not pass beyond your eyes over them desiring adornment (of) the life (of) the world and (do) not obey whom We Have Made Heedless his heart of Our rememberance and follows his desires and is his affair (in) excess

ayah: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَن شَآءَ فَلۡيُؤۡمِن وَمَن شَآءَ فَلۡيَكۡفُرۡۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ نَارًا أَحَاطَ بِهِمۡ سُرَادِقُهَاۚ وَإِن يَسۡتَغِيثُواْ يُغَاثُواْ بِمَآءٖ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ يَشۡوِي ٱلۡوُجُوهَۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلشَّرَابُ وَسَآءَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقًا
ayah_translit: waquli al-haqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyu'min waman shaa falyakfur inna a'tadna lilzzalimina naran ahata bihim suradiquha wa-in yastaghithu yughathu bimain kal-muh'li yashwi al-wujuha bi'sa al-sharabu wasaat mur'tafaqan
ayah_english: And say The truth (is) from your Lord so whoever wills let him believe and whoever wills let him disbelieve Indeed We have prepared for the wrongdoers a Fire will surround them its walls And if they call for relief they will be relieved with water like molten brass (which) scalds the faces Wretched (is) the drink and evil (is) the resting place

ayah: وَقُلِ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكُمۡۖ فَمَن شَآءَ فَلۡيُؤۡمِن وَمَن شَآءَ فَلۡيَكۡفُرۡۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ نَارًا أَحَاطَ بِهِمۡ سُرَادِقُهَاۚ وَإِن يَسۡتَغِيثُواْ يُغَاثُواْ بِمَآءٖ كَٱلۡمُهۡلِ يَشۡوِي ٱلۡوُجُوهَۚ بِئۡسَ ٱلشَّرَابُ وَسَآءَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقًا
ayah_translit: waquli al-haqu min rabbikum faman shaa falyu'min waman shaa falyakfur inna a'tadna lilzzalimina naran ahata bihim suradiquha wa-in yastaghithu yughathu bimain kal-muh'li yashwi al-wujuha bi'sa al-sharabu wasaat mur'tafaqan

ayah_english: And say The truth (is) from your Lord so whoever wills let him believe and whoever wills let him disbelieve Indeed We have prepared for the wrongdoers a Fire will surround them its walls And if they call for relief they will be relieved with water like molten brass (which) scalds the faces Wretched (is) the drink and evil (is) the resting place

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ مَنۡ أَحۡسَنَ عَمَلًا
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati inna la nudi'u ajra man ahsana amalan
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and did the good deeds indeed, We will not let go waste will not let go waste (the) reward (of one) who does good deeds

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ إِنَّا لَا نُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ مَنۡ أَحۡسَنَ عَمَلًا

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَيَلۡبَسُونَ ثِيَابًا خُضۡرٗا مِّن سُندُسٖ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٖ مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلثَّوَابُ وَحَسُنَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقٗا
ayah_translit: ulaika lahum jannatu adnin tajri min tahtihimu al-anharu yuhallawna fiha min asawira min dhahabin wayalbasuna thiyaban khud'ran min sundusin wa-is'tabraqin muttakiina fiha ala al-araiki ni'ma al-thawabu wahasunat mur'tafaqan
ayah_english: Those for them (are) Gardens of Eden flows from underneath them the rivers They will be adorned therein [of] (with) bracelets of gold and will wear garments green of fine silk and heavy brocade reclining therein on adorned couches Excellent (is) the reward and good (is) the resting place

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ عَدۡنٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ يُحَلَّوۡنَ فِيهَا مِنۡ أَسَاوِرَ مِن ذَهَبٖ وَيَلۡبَسُونَ ثِيَابًا خُضۡرٗا مِّن سُندُسٖ وَإِسۡتَبۡرَقٖ مُّتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِۚ نِعۡمَ ٱلثَّوَابُ وَحَسُنَتۡ مُرۡتَفَقٗا

ayah: ۞وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلٗا رَّجُلَيۡنِ جَعَلۡنَا لِأَحَدِهِمَا جَنَّتَيۡنِ مِنۡ أَعۡنَٰبٖ وَحَفَفۡنَٰهُمَا بِنَخۡلٖ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمَا زَرۡعٗا
ayah_translit: wa-id'rib lahum mathalan rajulayni ja'alna li-ahadihima jannatayni min a'nabin wahafafnahuma binakhlin waja'alna baynahuma zar'an
ayah_english: And set forth to them the example of two men: We provided for one of them two gardens of grapes and We bordered them with date-palms and We placed between both of them crops

ayah: ۞وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلٗا رَّجُلَيۡنِ جَعَلۡنَا لِأَحَدِهِمَا جَنَّتَيۡنِ مِنۡ أَعۡنَٰبٖ وَحَفَفۡنَٰهُمَا بِنَخۡلٖ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُمَا زَرۡعٗا

ayah: كِلۡتَا ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ ءَاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمۡ تَظۡلِم مِّنۡهُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَفَجَّرۡنَا خِلَٰلَهُمَا نَهَرٗا
ayah_translit: kil'ta al-janatayni atat ukulaha walam tazlim min'hu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
ayah_english: Each (of) the two gardens brought forth its produce and not did wrong of it anything And We caused to gush forth within them a river

ayah: كِلۡتَا ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ ءَاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمۡ تَظۡلِم مِّنۡهُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَفَجَّرۡنَا خِلَٰلَهُمَا نَهَرٗا
ayah_translit: kil'ta al-janatayni atat ukulaha walam tazlim min'hu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
ayah_english: Each (of) the two gardens brought forth its produce and not did wrong of it anything And We caused to gush forth within them a river

ayah: كِلۡتَا ٱلۡجَنَّتَيۡنِ ءَاتَتۡ أُكُلَهَا وَلَمۡ تَظۡلِم مِّنۡهُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ وَفَجَّرۡنَا خِلَٰلَهُمَا نَهَرٗا
ayah_translit: kil'ta al-janatayni atat ukulaha walam tazlim min'hu shayan wafajjarna khilalahuma naharan
ayah_english: Each (of) the two gardens brought forth its produce and not did wrong of it anything And We caused to gush forth within them a river

ayah: وَكَانَ لَهُۥ ثَمَرٞ فَقَالَ لِصَٰحِبِهِۦ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَنَا۠ أَكۡثَرُ مِنكَ مَالٗا وَأَعَزُّ نَفَرٗا
ayah_translit: wakana lahu thamarun faqala lisahibihi wahuwa yuhawiruhu ana aktharu minka malan wa-a'azzu nafaran
ayah_english: And was for him fruit so he said to his companion while he (was) talking with him I am greater than you (in) wealth and stronger (in) men

ayah: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٞ لِّنَفۡسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدٗا
ayah_translit: wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa zalimun linafsihi qala ma azunnu an tabida hadhihi abadan
ayah_english: And he entered his garden while he (was) unjust to himself He said Not I think that will perish this ever

ayah: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةٗ وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّي لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهَا مُنقَلَبٗا
ayah_translit: wama azunnu al-sa'ata qaimatan wala-in rudidttu ila rabbi la-ajidanna khayran min'ha munqalaban
ayah_english: And not I think the Hour will occur And if I am brought back to my Lord I will surely find better than this (as) a return

ayah: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرۡتَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰكَ رَجُلٗا
ayah_translit: qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhu akafarta bi-alladhi khalaqaka min turabin thumma min nut'fatin thumma sawwaka rajulan
ayah_english: Said to him his companion while he was talking to him Do you disbelieve in One Who created you from dust then from a minute quantity of semen then fashioned you (into) a man

ayah: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرۡتَ بِٱلَّذِي خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٖ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰكَ رَجُلٗا

ayah: لَّـٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: lakinna huwa al-lahu rabbi wala ush'riku birabbi ahadan
ayah_english: But as for me He (is) Allah my Lord and not I associate with my Lord anyone

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ دَخَلۡتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلۡتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالٗا وَوَلَدٗا
ayah_translit: walawla idh dakhalta jannataka qul'ta ma shaa al-lahu la quwwata illa bil-lahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malan wawaladan
ayah_english: And why (did you) not when you entered your garden say What wills Allah (there is) no power except with Allah If you see me lesser than you (in) wealth and children

ayah_english: And why (did you) not when you entered your garden say What wills Allah (there is) no power except with Allah If you see me lesser than you (in) wealth and children

ayah: وَلَوۡلَآ إِذۡ دَخَلۡتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلۡتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالٗا وَوَلَدٗا

ayah_english: And why (did you) not when you entered your garden say What wills Allah (there is) no power except with Allah If you see me lesser than you (in) wealth and children

ayah: فَعَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يُؤۡتِيَنِ خَيۡرٗا مِّن جَنَّتِكَ وَيُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهَا حُسۡبَانٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتُصۡبِحَ صَعِيدٗا زَلَقًا
ayah_translit: fa'asa rabbi an yu'tiyani khayran min jannatika wayur'sila alayha hus'banan mina al-samai fatus'biha sa'idan zalaqan
ayah_english: It may be that my Lord that my Lord will give me better than your garden and will send upon it a calamity from the sky then it will become ground slippery

ayah: فَعَسَىٰ رَبِّيٓ أَن يُؤۡتِيَنِ خَيۡرٗا مِّن جَنَّتِكَ وَيُرۡسِلَ عَلَيۡهَا حُسۡبَانٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتُصۡبِحَ صَعِيدٗا زَلَقًا

ayah: أَوۡ يُصۡبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوۡرٗا فَلَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبٗا
ayah_translit: aw yus'biha mauha ghawran falan tastati'a lahu talaban
ayah_english: Or will become its water sunken so never you will be able to find it to find it

ayah: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصۡبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيۡهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُشۡرِكۡ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-uhita bithamarihi fa-asbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi ala ma anfaqa fiha wahiya khawiyatun ala urushiha wayaqulu yalaytani lam ush'rik birabbi ahadan
ayah_english: And were surrounded his fruits so he began twisting his hands over what he (had) spent on it while it (had) collapsed on its trellises and he said Oh! I wish I had not associated I had not associated with my Lord anyone

ayah: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصۡبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيۡهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُشۡرِكۡ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wa-uhita bithamarihi fa-asbaha yuqallibu kaffayhi ala ma anfaqa fiha wahiya khawiyatun ala urushiha wayaqulu yalaytani lam ush'rik birabbi ahadan
ayah_english: And were surrounded his fruits so he began twisting his hands over what he (had) spent on it while it (had) collapsed on its trellises and he said Oh! I wish I had not associated I had not associated with my Lord anyone

ayah: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصۡبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيۡهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِيَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُشۡرِكۡ بِرَبِّيٓ أَحَدٗا

ayah: وَلَمۡ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٞ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا
ayah_translit: walam takun lahu fi-atun yansurunahu min duni al-lahi wama kana muntasiran
ayah_english: And not was for him a group (to) help him other than other than Allah and not was (he) supported

ayah: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا
ayah_translit: hunalika al-walayatu lillahi al-haqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun uq'ban
ayah_english: There the protection (is) from Allah the True He (is the) best (to) reward and (the) best (for) the final end

ayah_translit: hunalika al-walayatu lillahi al-haqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun uq'ban
ayah_english: There the protection (is) from Allah the True He (is the) best (to) reward and (the) best (for) the final end

ayah: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصۡبَحَ هَشِيمٗا تَذۡرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَٰحُۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّقۡتَدِرًا
ayah_translit: wa-id'rib lahum mathala al-hayati al-dun'ya kamain anzalnahu mina al-samai fa-ikh'talata bihi nabatu al-ardi fa-asbaha hashiman tadhruhu al-riyahu wakana al-lahu ala kulli shayin muq'tadiran
ayah_english: And present to them the example (of) the life (of) the world like water which We send down from the sky then mingles with it (the) vegetation (of) the earth then becomes dry stalks it (is) scattered (by) the winds And Allah And Allah over every thing (is) All Able

ayah: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخۡتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَصۡبَحَ هَشِيمٗا تَذۡرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَٰحُۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّقۡتَدِرًا

ayah: ٱلۡمَالُ وَٱلۡبَنُونَ زِينَةُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَٱلۡبَٰقِيَٰتُ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتُ خَيۡرٌ عِندَ رَبِّكَ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ أَمَلٗا
ayah_translit: al-malu wal-banuna zinatu al-hayati al-dun'ya wal-baqiyatu al-salihatu khayrun inda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun amalan
ayah_english: The wealth and children (are) adornment (of) the life (of) the world But the enduring good deeds (are) better near your Lord (for) reward and better (for) hope

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ نُسَيِّرُ ٱلۡجِبَالَ وَتَرَى ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَارِزَةٗ وَحَشَرۡنَٰهُمۡ فَلَمۡ نُغَادِرۡ مِنۡهُمۡ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wayawma nusayyiru al-jibala watara al-arda barizatan wahasharnahum falam nughadir min'hum ahadan
ayah_english: And the Day We will cause (to) move the mountains and you will see the earth (as) a leveled plain and We will gather them and not We will leave behind from them anyone

ayah_translit: wayawma nusayyiru al-jibala watara al-arda barizatan wahasharnahum falam nughadir min'hum ahadan

ayah: وَعُرِضُواْ عَلَىٰ رَبِّكَ صَفّٗا لَّقَدۡ جِئۡتُمُونَا كَمَا خَلَقۡنَٰكُمۡ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةِۭۚ بَلۡ زَعَمۡتُمۡ أَلَّن نَّجۡعَلَ لَكُم مَّوۡعِدٗا
ayah_translit: wa'uridu ala rabbika saffan laqad ji'tumuna kama khalaqnakum awwala marratin bal za'amtum allan naj'ala lakum maw'idan
ayah_english: And they will be presented before your Lord (in) rows Certainly you have come to Us as We created you the first time Nay you claimed that not We made for you an appointment

ayah: وَوُضِعَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ فَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُشۡفِقِينَ مِمَّا فِيهِ وَيَقُولُونَ يَٰوَيۡلَتَنَا مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا يُغَادِرُ صَغِيرَةٗ وَلَا كَبِيرَةً إِلَّآ أَحۡصَىٰهَاۚ وَوَجَدُواْ مَا عَمِلُواْ حَاضِرٗاۗ وَلَا يَظۡلِمُ رَبُّكَ أَحَدٗا
ayah_translit: wawudi'a al-kitabu fatara al-muj'rimina mush'fiqina mimma fihi wayaquluna yawaylatana mali hadha al-kitabi la yughadiru saghiratan wala kabiratan illa ahsaha wawajadu ma amilu hadiran wala yazlimu rabbuka ahadan
ayah_english: And (will) be placed the Book and you will see the criminals fearful of what (is) in it and they will say Oh woe to us! What (is) for this [the] Book not leaves a small and not a great except has enumerated it And they will find what they did presented And not deals unjustly your Lord (with) anyone

ayah_english: And (will) be placed the Book and you will see the criminals fearful of what (is) in it and they will say Oh woe to us! What (is) for this [the] Book not leaves a small and not a great except has enumerated it And they will find what they did presented And not deals unjustly your Lord (with) anyone

ayah: وَوُضِعَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبُ فَتَرَى ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ مُشۡفِقِينَ مِمَّا فِيهِ وَيَقُولُونَ يَٰوَيۡلَتَنَا مَالِ هَٰذَا ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا يُغَادِرُ صَغِيرَةٗ وَلَا كَبِيرَةً إِلَّآ أَحۡصَىٰهَاۚ وَوَجَدُواْ مَا عَمِلُواْ حَاضِرٗاۗ وَلَا يَظۡلِمُ رَبُّكَ أَحَدٗا

ayah: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَفَسَقَ عَنۡ أَمۡرِ رَبِّهِۦٓۗ أَفَتَتَّخِذُونَهُۥ وَذُرِّيَّتَهُۥٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِي وَهُمۡ لَكُمۡ عَدُوُّۢۚ بِئۡسَ لِلظَّـٰلِمِينَ بَدَلٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa kana mina al-jini fafasaqa an amri rabbihi afatattakhidhunahu wadhurriyyatahu awliyaa min duni wahum lakum aduwwun bi'sa lilzzalimina badalan
ayah_english: And when We said to the Angels Prostrate to Adam so they prostrated except Iblis (He) was of the jinn and he rebelled against the Command (of) his Lord Will you then take him and his offspring (as) protectors other than Me other than Me while they (are) to you enemies Wretched for the wrongdoers (is) the exchange

ayah_translit: wa-idh qul'na lil'malaikati us'judu liadama fasajadu illa ib'lisa kana mina al-jini fafasaqa an amri rabbihi afatattakhidhunahu wadhurriyyatahu awliyaa min duni wahum lakum aduwwun bi'sa lilzzalimina badalan

ayah: ۞مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا
ayah_translit: ma ashhadttuhum khalqa al-samawati wal-ardi wala khalqa anfusihim wama kuntu muttakhidha al-mudilina adudan
ayah_english: Not I made them witness the creation (of) the heavens and the earth and not the creation (of) themselves and not I Am the One to take the misleaders (as) helper(s)

ayah: ۞مَّآ أَشۡهَدتُّهُمۡ خَلۡقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا خَلۡقَ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمَا كُنتُ مُتَّخِذَ ٱلۡمُضِلِّينَ عَضُدٗا

ayah: وَيَوۡمَ يَقُولُ نَادُواْ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّوۡبِقٗا
ayah_translit: wayawma yaqulu nadu shurakaiya alladhina za'amtum fada'awhum falam yastajibu lahum waja'alna baynahum mawbiqan
ayah_english: And the Day He will say Call My partners those who you claimed then they will call them but not they will respond to them And We will make between them a barrier

ayah: وَرَءَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ ٱلنَّارَ فَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُم مُّوَاقِعُوهَا وَلَمۡ يَجِدُواْ عَنۡهَا مَصۡرِفٗا
ayah_translit: waraa al-muj'rimuna al-nara fazannu annahum muwaqi'uha walam yajidu anha masrifan
ayah_english: And will see the criminals the Fire and they (will be) certain that they are to fall in it And not they will find from it a way of escape

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad sarrafna fi hadha al-qur'ani lilnnasi min kulli mathalin wakana al-insanu akthara shayin jadalan
ayah_english: And certainly We have explained in this the Quran for mankind of every example But is the man (in) most things quarrelsome

ayah: وَلَقَدۡ صَرَّفۡنَا فِي هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ لِلنَّاسِ مِن كُلِّ مَثَلٖۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَكۡثَرَ شَيۡءٖ جَدَلٗا
ayah_translit: walaqad sarrafna fi hadha al-qur'ani lilnnasi min kulli mathalin wakana al-insanu akthara shayin jadalan
ayah_english: And certainly We have explained in this the Quran for mankind of every example But is the man (in) most things quarrelsome

ayah: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ قُبُلٗا
ayah_translit: wama mana'a al-nasa an yu'minu idh jaahumu al-huda wayastaghfiru rabbahum illa an tatiyahum sunnatu al-awalina aw yatiyahumu al-'adhabu qubulan
ayah_english: And nothing prevents men that they believe when has come to them the guidance and they ask forgiveness (of) their Lord except that comes to them (the) way (of) the former (people) or comes to them the punishment before (them)

ayah: وَمَا مَنَعَ ٱلنَّاسَ أَن يُؤۡمِنُوٓاْ إِذۡ جَآءَهُمُ ٱلۡهُدَىٰ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّهُمۡ إِلَّآ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ سُنَّةُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ أَوۡ يَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُ قُبُلٗا
ayah_translit: wama mana'a al-nasa an yu'minu idh jaahumu al-huda wayastaghfiru rabbahum illa an tatiyahum sunnatu al-awalina aw yatiyahumu al-'adhabu qubulan

ayah_english: And nothing prevents men that they believe when has come to them the guidance and they ask forgiveness (of) their Lord except that comes to them (the) way (of) the former (people) or comes to them the punishment before (them)

ayah: وَمَا نُرۡسِلُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَۚ وَيُجَٰدِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَمَآ أُنذِرُواْ هُزُوٗا
ayah_translit: wama nur'silu al-mur'salina illa mubashirina wamundhirina wayujadilu alladhina kafaru bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa wa-ittakhadhu ayati wama undhiru huzuwan
ayah_english: And not We send the Messengers except (as) bearers of glad tidings and (as) warners And dispute those who disbelieve with falsehood to refute thereby the truth And they take My Verses and what they are warned (in) ridicule

ayah: وَمَا نُرۡسِلُ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ إِلَّا مُبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَۚ وَيُجَٰدِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ لِيُدۡحِضُواْ بِهِ ٱلۡحَقَّۖ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَمَآ أُنذِرُواْ هُزُوٗا

ayah_translit: wama nur'silu al-mur'salina illa mubashirina wamundhirina wayujadilu alladhina kafaru bil-batili liyud'hidu bihi al-haqa wa-ittakhadhu ayati wama undhiru huzuwan
ayah_english: And not We send the Messengers except (as) bearers of glad tidings and (as) warners And dispute those who disbelieve with falsehood to refute thereby the truth And they take My Verses and what they are warned (in) ridicule

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ فَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَا وَنَسِيَ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُۚ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفۡقَهُوهُ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٗاۖ وَإِن تَدۡعُهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَلَن يَهۡتَدُوٓاْ إِذًا أَبَدٗا
ayah_translit: waman azlamu mimman dhukkira biayati rabbihi fa-a'rada anha wanasiya ma qaddamat yadahu inna ja'alna ala qulubihim akinnatan an yafqahuhu wafi adhanihim waqran wa-in tad'uhum ila al-huda falan yahtadu idhan abadan
ayah_english: And who (is) more wrong than (he) who is reminded of the Verses (of) his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what have sent forth his hands Indeed We [We] have placed over their hearts coverings lest they understand it and in their ears (is) deafness And if you call them to the guidance then never they will be guided then ever

ayah: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّن ذُكِّرَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِۦ فَأَعۡرَضَ عَنۡهَا وَنَسِيَ مَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاهُۚ إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ أَكِنَّةً أَن يَفۡقَهُوهُ وَفِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَقۡرٗاۖ وَإِن تَدۡعُهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَلَن يَهۡتَدُوٓاْ إِذًا أَبَدٗا

ayah_english: And who (is) more wrong than (he) who is reminded of the Verses (of) his Lord but turns away from them and forgets what have sent forth his hands Indeed We [We] have placed over their hearts coverings lest they understand it and in their ears (is) deafness And if you call them to the guidance then never they will be guided then ever

ayah: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ذُو ٱلرَّحۡمَةِۖ لَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُهُم بِمَا كَسَبُواْ لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ بَل لَّهُم مَّوۡعِدٞ لَّن يَجِدُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَوۡئِلٗا
ayah_translit: warabbuka al-ghafuru dhu al-rahmati law yuakhidhuhum bima kasabu la'ajjala lahumu al-'adhaba bal lahum maw'idun lan yajidu min dunihi mawilan
ayah_english: And your Lord (is) the Most Forgiving Owner (of) the Mercy If He were to seize them for what they have earned surely, He (would) have hastened for them the punishment But for them (is) an appointment never they will find other than it other than it an escape

ayah: وَرَبُّكَ ٱلۡغَفُورُ ذُو ٱلرَّحۡمَةِۖ لَوۡ يُؤَاخِذُهُم بِمَا كَسَبُواْ لَعَجَّلَ لَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابَۚ بَل لَّهُم مَّوۡعِدٞ لَّن يَجِدُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦ مَوۡئِلٗا

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰٓ أَهۡلَكۡنَٰهُمۡ لَمَّا ظَلَمُواْ وَجَعَلۡنَا لِمَهۡلِكِهِم مَّوۡعِدٗا
ayah_translit: watil'ka al-qura ahlaknahum lamma zalamu waja'alna limahlikihim maw'idan
ayah_english: And these [the] towns We destroyed them when they wronged and We made for their destruction an appointed time

ayah: وَإِذۡ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِفَتَىٰهُ لَآ أَبۡرَحُ حَتَّىٰٓ أَبۡلُغَ مَجۡمَعَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَيۡنِ أَوۡ أَمۡضِيَ حُقُبٗا
ayah_translit: wa-idh qala musa lifatahu la abrahu hatta ablugha majma'a al-bahrayni aw amdiya huquban
ayah_english: And when said Musa to his boy Not I will cease until I reach the junction (of) the two seas or I continue (for) a long period

ayah_translit: wa-idh qala musa lifatahu la abrahu hatta ablugha majma'a al-bahrayni aw amdiya huquban

ayah: فَلَمَّا بَلَغَا مَجۡمَعَ بَيۡنِهِمَا نَسِيَا حُوتَهُمَا فَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ سَرَبٗا
ayah_translit: falamma balagha majma'a baynihima nasiya hutahuma fa-ittakhadha sabilahu fi al-bahri saraban
ayah_english: But when they reached the junction between them they forgot their fish and it took its way into the sea slipping away

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدۡ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَٰذَا نَصَبٗا
ayah_translit: falamma jawaza qala lifatahu atina ghadaana laqad laqina min safarina hadha nasaban
ayah_english: Then when they had passed beyond he said to his boy Bring us our morning meal Certainly we have suffered in our journey this fatigue

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَاوَزَا قَالَ لِفَتَىٰهُ ءَاتِنَا غَدَآءَنَا لَقَدۡ لَقِينَا مِن سَفَرِنَا هَٰذَا نَصَبٗا

ayah: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَ إِذۡ أَوَيۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلصَّخۡرَةِ فَإِنِّي نَسِيتُ ٱلۡحُوتَ وَمَآ أَنسَىٰنِيهُ إِلَّا ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَنۡ أَذۡكُرَهُۥۚ وَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ عَجَبٗا
ayah_translit: qala ara-ayta idh awayna ila al-sakhrati fa-inni nasitu al-huta wama ansanihu illa al-shaytanu an adhkurahu wa-ittakhadha sabilahu fi al-bahri ajaban
ayah_english: He said Did you see when we retired to the rock Then indeed I [I] forgot the fish And not made me forget it except the Shaitaan that I mention it And it took its way into the sea amazingly

ayah: قَالَ أَرَءَيۡتَ إِذۡ أَوَيۡنَآ إِلَى ٱلصَّخۡرَةِ فَإِنِّي نَسِيتُ ٱلۡحُوتَ وَمَآ أَنسَىٰنِيهُ إِلَّا ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ أَنۡ أَذۡكُرَهُۥۚ وَٱتَّخَذَ سَبِيلَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ عَجَبٗا

ayah: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنَّا نَبۡغِۚ فَٱرۡتَدَّا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَارِهِمَا قَصَصٗا
ayah_translit: qala dhalika ma kunna nabghi fa-ir'tadda ala atharihima qasasan
ayah_english: He said That (is) what we were seeking So they returned on their footprints retracing

ayah: فَوَجَدَا عَبۡدٗا مِّنۡ عِبَادِنَآ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَا وَعَلَّمۡنَٰهُ مِن لَّدُنَّا عِلۡمٗا
ayah_translit: fawajada abdan min ibadina ataynahu rahmatan min indina wa'allamnahu min ladunna il'man
ayah_english: Then they found a servant from Our servants whom We had given mercy from Us and We had taught him from Us a knowledge

ayah_translit: fawajada abdan min ibadina ataynahu rahmatan min indina wa'allamnahu min ladunna il'man

ayah: قَالَ لَهُۥ مُوسَىٰ هَلۡ أَتَّبِعُكَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن تُعَلِّمَنِ مِمَّا عُلِّمۡتَ رُشۡدٗا
ayah_translit: qala lahu musa hal attabi'uka ala an tu'allimani mimma ullim'ta rush'dan
ayah_english: Said to him Musa May I follow you on that you teach me of what you have been taught (of) right guidance

ayah: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
ayah_english: He said Indeed you never will be able with me (to have) patience

ayah: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا
ayah_translit: wakayfa tasbiru ala ma lam tuhit bihi khub'ran
ayah_english: And how can you have patience for what not you encompass of it any knowledge

ayah: قَالَ سَتَجِدُنِيٓ إِن شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ صَابِرٗا وَلَآ أَعۡصِي لَكَ أَمۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala satajiduni in shaa al-lahu sabiran wala a'si laka amran
ayah_english: He said You will find me if Allah wills Allah wills patient and not I will disobey your order

ayah: قَالَ فَإِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتَنِي فَلَا تَسۡـَٔلۡنِي عَن شَيۡءٍ حَتَّىٰٓ أُحۡدِثَ لَكَ مِنۡهُ ذِكۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala fa-ini ittaba'tani fala tasalni an shayin hatta uh'ditha laka min'hu dhik'ran
ayah_english: He said Then if you follow me (do) not ask me about anything until I present to you of it a mention

ayah: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَكِبَا فِي ٱلسَّفِينَةِ خَرَقَهَاۖ قَالَ أَخَرَقۡتَهَا لِتُغۡرِقَ أَهۡلَهَا لَقَدۡ جِئۡتَ شَيۡـًٔا إِمۡرٗا
ayah_translit: fa-intalaqa hatta idha rakiba fi al-safinati kharaqaha qala akharaqtaha litugh'riqa ahlaha laqad ji'ta shayan im'ran
ayah_english: So they both set out until when they had embarked on the ship he made a hole in it He said Have you made a hole in it to drown its people Certainly you have done a thing grave

ayah: قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُلۡ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala alam aqul innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
ayah_english: He said Did not I say indeed you never will be able with me (to have) patience

ayah: قَالَ لَا تُؤَاخِذۡنِي بِمَا نَسِيتُ وَلَا تُرۡهِقۡنِي مِنۡ أَمۡرِي عُسۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala la tuakhidh'ni bima nasitu wala tur'hiq'ni min amri us'ran
ayah_english: He said (Do) not blame me for what I forgot and (do) not be hard (upon) me in my affair (raising) difficulty

ayah: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا لَقِيَا غُلَٰمٗا فَقَتَلَهُۥ قَالَ أَقَتَلۡتَ نَفۡسٗا زَكِيَّةَۢ بِغَيۡرِ نَفۡسٖ لَّقَدۡ جِئۡتَ شَيۡـٔٗا نُّكۡرٗا
ayah_translit: fa-intalaqa hatta idha laqiya ghulaman faqatalahu qala aqatalta nafsan zakiyyatan bighayri nafsin laqad ji'ta shayan nuk'ran
ayah_english: Then they both set out until when they met a boy then he killed him He said Have you killed a soul pure for other than a soul Certainly you have done a thing evil

ayah: ۞قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala alam aqul laka innaka lan tastati'a ma'iya sabran
ayah_english: He said Did not I say to you that you never will be able with me (to have) patience

ayah: قَالَ إِن سَأَلۡتُكَ عَن شَيۡءِۭ بَعۡدَهَا فَلَا تُصَٰحِبۡنِيۖ قَدۡ بَلَغۡتَ مِن لَّدُنِّي عُذۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala in sa-altuka an shayin ba'daha fala tusahib'ni qad balaghta min ladunni udh'ran
ayah_english: He said If I ask you about anything after it then (do) not keep me as a companion Verily you have reached from me from me an excuse

ayah: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَيَآ أَهۡلَ قَرۡيَةٍ ٱسۡتَطۡعَمَآ أَهۡلَهَا فَأَبَوۡاْ أَن يُضَيِّفُوهُمَا فَوَجَدَا فِيهَا جِدَارٗا يُرِيدُ أَن يَنقَضَّ فَأَقَامَهُۥۖ قَالَ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ لَتَّخَذۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرٗا
ayah_translit: fa-intalaqa hatta idha ataya ahla qaryatin is'tat'ama ahlaha fa-abaw an yudayyifuhuma fawajada fiha jidaran yuridu an yanqadda fa-aqamahu qala law shi'ta lattakhadhta alayhi ajran
ayah_english: So they set out until when they came (to the) people (of) a town they asked for food (from) its people but they refused to offer them hospitality Then they found in it a wall (that) want(ed) to collapse so he set it straight He said If you wished surely you (could) have taken for it a payment

ayah: فَٱنطَلَقَا حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَآ أَتَيَآ أَهۡلَ قَرۡيَةٍ ٱسۡتَطۡعَمَآ أَهۡلَهَا فَأَبَوۡاْ أَن يُضَيِّفُوهُمَا فَوَجَدَا فِيهَا جِدَارٗا يُرِيدُ أَن يَنقَضَّ فَأَقَامَهُۥۖ قَالَ لَوۡ شِئۡتَ لَتَّخَذۡتَ عَلَيۡهِ أَجۡرٗا

ayah: قَالَ هَٰذَا فِرَاقُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنِكَۚ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأۡوِيلِ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡتَطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَبۡرًا
ayah_translit: qala hadha firaqu bayni wabaynika sa-unabbi-uka bitawili ma lam tastati' alayhi sabran
ayah_english: He said This (is) parting between me and between you I will inform you of (the) interpretation (of) what not you were able on it (to have) patience

ayah: قَالَ هَٰذَا فِرَاقُ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنِكَۚ سَأُنَبِّئُكَ بِتَأۡوِيلِ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡتَطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَبۡرًا

ayah: أَمَّا ٱلسَّفِينَةُ فَكَانَتۡ لِمَسَٰكِينَ يَعۡمَلُونَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ فَأَرَدتُّ أَنۡ أَعِيبَهَا وَكَانَ وَرَآءَهُم مَّلِكٞ يَأۡخُذُ كُلَّ سَفِينَةٍ غَصۡبٗا
ayah_translit: amma al-safinatu fakanat limasakina ya'maluna fi al-bahri fa-aradttu an a'ibaha wakana waraahum malikun yakhudhu kulla safinatin ghasban
ayah_english: As for the ship it was of (the) poor people working in the sea So I intended that I cause defect (in) it (as there) was after them a king who seized every ship (by) force

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡغُلَٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤۡمِنَيۡنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرۡهِقَهُمَا طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗا
ayah_translit: wa-amma al-ghulamu fakana abawahu mu'minayni fakhashina an yur'hiqahuma tugh'yanan wakuf'ran
ayah_english: And as for the boy his parents were his parents were believers and we feared that he would overburden them (by) transgression and disbelief

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡغُلَٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤۡمِنَيۡنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرۡهِقَهُمَا طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗا

ayah_english: And as for the boy his parents were his parents were believers and we feared that he would overburden them (by) transgression and disbelief

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡغُلَٰمُ فَكَانَ أَبَوَاهُ مُؤۡمِنَيۡنِ فَخَشِينَآ أَن يُرۡهِقَهُمَا طُغۡيَٰنٗا وَكُفۡرٗا

ayah: فَأَرَدۡنَآ أَن يُبۡدِلَهُمَا رَبُّهُمَا خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُ زَكَوٰةٗ وَأَقۡرَبَ رُحۡمٗا
ayah_translit: fa-aradna an yub'dilahuma rabbuhuma khayran min'hu zakatan wa-aqraba ruh'man
ayah_english: So we intended that would change for them their Lord a better than him (in) purity and nearer (in) affection

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡجِدَارُ فَكَانَ لِغُلَٰمَيۡنِ يَتِيمَيۡنِ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ وَكَانَ تَحۡتَهُۥ كَنزٞ لَّهُمَا وَكَانَ أَبُوهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا فَأَرَادَ رَبُّكَ أَن يَبۡلُغَآ أَشُدَّهُمَا وَيَسۡتَخۡرِجَا كَنزَهُمَا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ وَمَا فَعَلۡتُهُۥ عَنۡ أَمۡرِيۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَأۡوِيلُ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَبۡرٗا
ayah_translit: wa-amma al-jidaru fakana lighulamayni yatimayni fi al-madinati wakana tahtahu kanzun lahuma wakana abuhuma salihan fa-arada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahuma wayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbika wama fa'altuhu an amri dhalika tawilu ma lam tasti' alayhi sabran
ayah_english: And as for the wall it was for two orphan boys for two orphan boys in the town and was underneath it a treasure for them and was their father righteous So intended your Lord that they reach their maturity and bring forth their treasure (as) a mercy from your Lord And not I did it on my (own) accord That (is the) interpretation (of) what not you were able on it (to have) patience

ayah_translit: wa-amma al-jidaru fakana lighulamayni yatimayni fi al-madinati wakana tahtahu kanzun lahuma wakana abuhuma salihan fa-arada rabbuka an yablugha ashuddahuma wayastakhrija kanzahuma rahmatan min rabbika wama fa'altuhu an amri dhalika tawilu ma lam tasti' alayhi sabran

ayah: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡجِدَارُ فَكَانَ لِغُلَٰمَيۡنِ يَتِيمَيۡنِ فِي ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ وَكَانَ تَحۡتَهُۥ كَنزٞ لَّهُمَا وَكَانَ أَبُوهُمَا صَٰلِحٗا فَأَرَادَ رَبُّكَ أَن يَبۡلُغَآ أَشُدَّهُمَا وَيَسۡتَخۡرِجَا كَنزَهُمَا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ وَمَا فَعَلۡتُهُۥ عَنۡ أَمۡرِيۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَأۡوِيلُ مَا لَمۡ تَسۡطِع عَّلَيۡهِ صَبۡرٗا

ayah: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا
ayah_translit: wayasalunaka an dhi al-qarnayni qul sa-atlu alaykum min'hu dhik'ran
ayah_english: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain Dhul-qarnain Say I will recite to you about him a remembrance

ayah_english: And they ask you about Dhul-qarnain Dhul-qarnain Say I will recite to you about him a remembrance

ayah: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ سَبَبٗا
ayah_translit: inna makkanna lahu fi al-ardi waataynahu min kulli shayin sababan
ayah_english: Indeed We [We] established [for] him in the earth and We gave him of every thing a means

ayah: فَأَتۡبَعَ سَبَبًا
ayah_translit: fa-atba'a sababan
ayah_english: So he followed a course

ayah: فَأَتۡبَعَ سَبَبًا
ayah_translit: fa-atba'a sababan
ayah_english: So he followed a course

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغۡرِبَ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغۡرُبُ فِي عَيۡنٍ حَمِئَةٖ وَوَجَدَ عِندَهَا قَوۡمٗاۖ قُلۡنَا يَٰذَا ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِمَّآ أَن تُعَذِّبَ وَإِمَّآ أَن تَتَّخِذَ فِيهِمۡ حُسۡنٗا
ayah_translit: hatta idha balagha maghriba al-shamsi wajadaha taghrubu fi aynin hami-atin wawajada indaha qawman qul'na yadha al-qarnayni imma an tu'adhiba wa-imma an tattakhidha fihim hus'nan
ayah_english: Until when he reached (the) setting place (of) the sun he found it setting in a spring (of) dark mud and he found near it a community We said O Dhul-qarnain O Dhul-qarnain Either [that] you punish or [that] you take [in] them (with) goodness

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَغۡرِبَ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَغۡرُبُ فِي عَيۡنٍ حَمِئَةٖ وَوَجَدَ عِندَهَا قَوۡمٗاۖ قُلۡنَا يَٰذَا ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِمَّآ أَن تُعَذِّبَ وَإِمَّآ أَن تَتَّخِذَ فِيهِمۡ حُسۡنٗا

ayah_english: Until when he reached (the) setting place (of) the sun he found it setting in a spring (of) dark mud and he found near it a community We said O Dhul-qarnain O Dhul-qarnain Either [that] you punish or [that] you take [in] them (with) goodness

ayah: قَالَ أَمَّا مَن ظَلَمَ فَسَوۡفَ نُعَذِّبُهُۥ ثُمَّ يُرَدُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ فَيُعَذِّبُهُۥ عَذَابٗا نُّكۡرٗا
ayah_translit: qala amma man zalama fasawfa nu'adhibuhu thumma yuraddu ila rabbihi fayu'adhibuhu adhaban nuk'ran
ayah_english: He said As for (one) who wrongs then soon we will punish him Then he will be returned to his Lord and He will punish him (with) a punishment terrible

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا
ayah_translit: wa-amma man amana wa'amila salihan falahu jazaan al-hus'na wasanaqulu lahu min amrina yus'ran
ayah_english: But as for (one) who believes and does righteous (deeds) then for him (is) a reward good And we will speak to him from our command (with) ease

ayah: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَهُۥ جَزَآءً ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۖ وَسَنَقُولُ لَهُۥ مِنۡ أَمۡرِنَا يُسۡرٗا

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ مَطۡلِعَ ٱلشَّمۡسِ وَجَدَهَا تَطۡلُعُ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمٖ لَّمۡ نَجۡعَل لَّهُم مِّن دُونِهَا سِتۡرٗا
ayah_translit: hatta idha balagha matli'a al-shamsi wajadaha tatlu'u ala qawmin lam naj'al lahum min duniha sit'ran
ayah_english: Until when he reached (the) rising place (of) the sun and he found it rising on a community not We made for them against it against it any shelter

ayah: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا بَلَغَ بَيۡنَ ٱلسَّدَّيۡنِ وَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمَا قَوۡمٗا لَّا يَكَادُونَ يَفۡقَهُونَ قَوۡلٗا
ayah_translit: hatta idha balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dunihima qawman la yakaduna yafqahuna qawlan
ayah_english: Until when he reached between the two mountains he found besides them besides them a community not who would almost understand (his) speech

ayah_translit: hatta idha balagha bayna al-sadayni wajada min dunihima qawman la yakaduna yafqahuna qawlan
ayah_english: Until when he reached between the two mountains he found besides them besides them a community not who would almost understand (his) speech

ayah: قَالُواْ يَٰذَا ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِ إِنَّ يَأۡجُوجَ وَمَأۡجُوجَ مُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَهَلۡ نَجۡعَلُ لَكَ خَرۡجًا عَلَىٰٓ أَن تَجۡعَلَ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ سَدّٗا
ayah_translit: qalu yadha al-qarnayni inna yajuja wamajuja muf'siduna fi al-ardi fahal naj'alu laka kharjan ala an taj'ala baynana wabaynahum saddan
ayah_english: They said O Dhul-qarnain O Dhul-qarnain Indeed Yajuj and Majuj (are) corrupters in the land So may we make for you an expenditure [on] that you make between us and between them a barrier

ayah: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّي فِيهِ رَبِّي خَيۡرٞ فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا
ayah_translit: qala ma makkanni fihi rabbi khayrun fa-a'inuni biquwwatin aj'al baynakum wabaynahum radman
ayah_english: He said What has established me [in it] my Lord (is) better but assist me with strength I will make between you and between them a barrier

ayah: قَالَ مَا مَكَّنِّي فِيهِ رَبِّي خَيۡرٞ فَأَعِينُونِي بِقُوَّةٍ أَجۡعَلۡ بَيۡنَكُمۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ رَدۡمًا
ayah_translit: qala ma makkanni fihi rabbi khayrun fa-a'inuni biquwwatin aj'al baynakum wabaynahum radman
ayah_english: He said What has established me [in it] my Lord (is) better but assist me with strength I will make between you and between them a barrier

ayah: ءَاتُونِي زُبَرَ ٱلۡحَدِيدِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيۡنَ ٱلصَّدَفَيۡنِ قَالَ ٱنفُخُواْۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَعَلَهُۥ نَارٗا قَالَ ءَاتُونِيٓ أُفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡهِ قِطۡرٗا
ayah_translit: atuni zubara al-hadidi hatta idha sawa bayna al-sadafayni qala unfukhu hatta idha ja'alahu naran qala atuni uf'righ alayhi qit'ran
ayah_english: Bring me sheets (of) iron until when he (had) leveled between the two cliffs he said Blow until when he made it fire he said Bring me I pour over it molten copper

ayah: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا
ayah_translit: fama is'ta'u an yazharuhu wama is'tata'u lahu naqban
ayah_english: So not they were able to scale it and not they were able in it (to do) any penetration

ayah_english: So not they were able to scale it and not they were able in it (to do) any penetration

ayah: فَمَا ٱسۡطَٰعُوٓاْ أَن يَظۡهَرُوهُ وَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ لَهُۥ نَقۡبٗا
ayah_translit: fama is'ta'u an yazharuhu wama is'tata'u lahu naqban
ayah_english: So not they were able to scale it and not they were able in it (to do) any penetration

ayah: قَالَ هَٰذَا رَحۡمَةٞ مِّن رَّبِّيۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي جَعَلَهُۥ دَكَّآءَۖ وَكَانَ وَعۡدُ رَبِّي حَقّٗا
ayah_translit: qala hadha rahmatun min rabbi fa-idha jaa wa'du rabbi ja'alahu dakkaa wakana wa'du rabbi haqqan
ayah_english: He said This (is) a mercy from my Lord But when comes (the) Promise (of) my Lord He will make it level And is (the) Promise (of) my Lord true

ayah: ۞وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
ayah_translit: watarakna ba'dahum yawma-idhin yamuju fi ba'din wanufikha fi al-suri fajama'nahum jam'an
ayah_english: And We (will) leave some of them (on) that Day to surge over others and (will be) blown in the trumpet then We (will) gather them all together

ayah_translit: wa'aradna jahannama yawma-idhin lil'kafirina ardan

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتۡ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ فِي غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكۡرِي وَكَانُواْ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَمۡعًا
ayah_translit: alladhina kanat a'yunuhum fi ghitain an dhik'ri wakanu la yastati'una sam'an
ayah_english: Those had been their eyes within a cover from My remembrance and were not able (to) hear

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ كَانَتۡ أَعۡيُنُهُمۡ فِي غِطَآءٍ عَن ذِكۡرِي وَكَانُواْ لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ سَمۡعًا
ayah_translit: alladhina kanat a'yunuhum fi ghitain an dhik'ri wakanu la yastati'una sam'an
ayah_english: Those had been their eyes within a cover from My remembrance and were not able (to) hear

ayah: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن يَتَّخِذُواْ عِبَادِي مِن دُونِيٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ نُزُلٗا
ayah_translit: afahasiba alladhina kafaru an yattakhidhu ibadi min duni awliyaa inna a'tadna jahannama lil'kafirina nuzulan
ayah_english: Do then think those who disbelieve that they (can) take My servants besides Me besides Me (as) protectors Indeed, We We have prepared Hell for the disbelievers (as) a lodging

ayah: أَفَحَسِبَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ أَن يَتَّخِذُواْ عِبَادِي مِن دُونِيٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۚ إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا جَهَنَّمَ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ نُزُلٗا

ayah: قُلۡ هَلۡ نُنَبِّئُكُم بِٱلۡأَخۡسَرِينَ أَعۡمَٰلًا
ayah_translit: qul hal nunabbi-ukum bil-akhsarina a'malan
ayah_english: Say Shall We inform you of the greatest losers (as to their) deeds

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا
ayah_translit: alladhina dalla sa'yuhum fi al-hayati al-dun'ya wahum yahsabuna annahum yuh'sinuna sun'an
ayah_english: Those is lost their effort in the life (of) the world while they think that they (were) acquiring good (in) work

ayah: ٱلَّذِينَ ضَلَّ سَعۡيُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَهُمۡ يَحۡسَبُونَ أَنَّهُمۡ يُحۡسِنُونَ صُنۡعًا

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَزۡنٗا
ayah_translit: ulaika alladhina kafaru biayati rabbihim waliqaihi fahabitat a'maluhum fala nuqimu lahum yawma al-qiyamati waznan
ayah_english: Those (are) the ones who disbelieve in the Verses (of) their Lord and the meeting (with) Him So (are) vain their deeds so not We will assign for them (on) the Day (of) the Resurrection any weight

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَزۡنٗا

ayah: أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَلِقَآئِهِۦ فَحَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ فَلَا نُقِيمُ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ وَزۡنٗا

ayah: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ جَهَنَّمُ بِمَا كَفَرُواْ وَٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ ءَايَٰتِي وَرُسُلِي هُزُوًا
ayah_translit: dhalika jazauhum jahannamu bima kafaru wa-ittakhadhu ayati warusuli huzuwan
ayah_english: That (is) their recompense Hell because they disbelieved and took My Verses and My Messengers (in) ridicule

ayah: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّـٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا
ayah_translit: inna alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati kanat lahum jannatu al-fir'dawsi nuzulan
ayah_english: Indeed those who believed and did righteous deeds for them will be for them will be Gardens (of) the Paradise (as) a lodging

ayah: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا
ayah_translit: khalidina fiha la yabghuna anha hiwalan
ayah_english: Abiding forever in it Not they will desire from it any transfer

ayah: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا
ayah_translit: qul law kana al-bahru midadan likalimati rabbi lanafida al-bahru qabla an tanfada kalimatu rabbi walaw ji'na bimith'lihi madadan
ayah_english: Say If were the sea ink for (the) Words (of) my Lord surely (would be) exhausted the sea before [that] (were) exhausted (the) Words (of) my Lord even if We brought (the) like (of) it (as) a supplement

ayah: قُل لَّوۡ كَانَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ مِدَادٗا لِّكَلِمَٰتِ رَبِّي لَنَفِدَ ٱلۡبَحۡرُ قَبۡلَ أَن تَنفَدَ كَلِمَٰتُ رَبِّي وَلَوۡ جِئۡنَا بِمِثۡلِهِۦ مَدَدٗا

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلۡيَعۡمَلۡ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا وَلَا يُشۡرِكۡ بِعِبَادَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ أَحَدَۢا
ayah_translit: qul innama ana basharun mith'lukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun faman kana yarju liqaa rabbihi falya'mal amalan salihan wala yush'rik bi'ibadati rabbihi ahadan
ayah_english: Say Only I (am) a man like you Has been revealed to me that your God (is) God One So whoever is hoping (for the) meeting (with) his Lord let him do deeds righteous and not associate in (the) worship (of) his Lord anyone

ayah: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُكُمۡ يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ أَنَّمَآ إِلَٰهُكُمۡ إِلَٰهٞ وَٰحِدٞۖ فَمَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ رَبِّهِۦ فَلۡيَعۡمَلۡ عَمَلٗا صَٰلِحٗا وَلَا يُشۡرِكۡ بِعِبَادَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ أَحَدَۢا

ayah_translit: qul innama ana basharun mith'lukum yuha ilayya annama ilahukum ilahun wahidun faman kana yarju liqaa rabbihi falya'mal amalan salihan wala yush'rik bi'ibadati rabbihi ahadan
